dependenciesComments.react-transition-group: Helps with animation transitions when changing pages. Used in src/routes.js

scripts.cycle: npm run lintfix && npm run build && npm run copy
scripts.cycle-nolint: npm run build && npm run copy

scriptsComments.start: Runs development build on a local server configured by create-react-app
scriptsComments.build: Builds the app for production to the build folder. Provided by create-react-app
scriptsComments.test: Runs the test watcher in an interactive mode. Provided by create-react-app
scriptsComments.eject: Un-abstracts the modules used by create-react-app
scriptsComments.copy: The /www folder is replaced with the contents of the /build folder
scriptsComments.lint: Runs ESlint against code directory - ignores warnings; ignores files in .eslintignore; options in .eslintrc.js; doesn't change code
scriptsComments.lintfix: Same as lint script but will fix any issues/prettify the code where it can
scriptsComments.cycle: Main script for building the app for production. Will stop if ESlint finds any errors
scriptsComments.cycle-nolint: Builds the app for production but no linting
